data.title: Thanksgiving in Sharon CT
data.meta_description: Jill and I spent last weekend in Sharon Connecticut.  It's a tiny town that boarders with New York and only a few miles south of Massachusetts.   The beautiful woods and the lack of cell service made it a perfect break from the city.  Many thanks to the Putzels for their hospitality! all images ©…
data.text:
Jill and I spent last weekend in Sharon Connecticut. It’s a tiny town that boarders with New York and only a few miles south of Massachusetts. The beautiful woods and the lack of cell service made it a perfect break from the city. Many thanks to the Putzels for their hospitality!

all images © garrett rowland 2013

Published by garow311

I am a Northern California born, Brooklyn based photographer. I created this to hopefully give people a different perspective of what I do. What I enjoy about the blog as a medium, is it feels like a pet that needs to be fed in order to be happy and grow. Hopefully this isn’t like every fish I’ve ever owned and I can keep it alive! -g View all posts by garow311
